review_blob: Very litte body for a stout.  It definately has a coffee flavor, but suprisingly very bitter (from the coffee, not the hops), and not in a good way.

Nice hop aroma, just enough body to handle the bitterness (unlike Dogfish 60min)

My favorite american IPA.   Best served on cask (if you can find it)

My favorite Imperial IPA.  Reminds me so much of their 5th Anniversary.  Malty with a slightly sweet taste.  And then come the hops.  An almost overwhelming (but in a good way) hoppy aroma and nicely bitter.  Pretty close to being hop candy.
Another great beer from Heavyweight. Suprisingly made with a lager yeast.
